about_me_intro: Hello! I'm Mohamed, a passionate web developer and IT specialist with a knack for creating elegant and efficient solutions. This space is a showcase of my journey, skills, and the projects I've poured my dedication into. Feel free to explore and get in touch!
intro: My name is Mohamed Khaled Elsharaby. I am 25 years old and have a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science (GPA 3.17 out of 4.0) from Thebes Academy in Egypt. My final project was a price-comparison web application and earned a grade of 4.0 out of 4.0.
ambition: I want an apprenticeship as a Fachinformatiker for system integration. I also enjoy building web applications with PHP, MySQL, and React. Through my studies, CCNA certification, and IT support experience, I have good skills in networking, system administration, and IT infrastructure.

readiness_points.languages: I speak German at B1/B2 level and English fluently.
readiness_points.relocation: I am ready to move to Germany soon.
readiness_points.documents: All my documents are complete and certified.
